question:
Which of the following matches of the name of the hill stations of Jammu & Kashmir and their meaning are correct?
1. Sonmarg- Meadow of Gold
2. Yusmarg- Meadow of Jesus
3. Gulmarg- Meadow of flowers
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The meaning of Sonmarg- "Meadow of Gold". The meaning of Yusmarg- "Meadow of Jesus". The meaning of Gulmarg- "Meadow of flowers".
